post:
Hello,

I have a dedi that I am playing around with OpenGamePanel on and would like to give away some free game / voice servers.

The server is located in Chicago, and can support most Source Engine Games, MineCraft (Vanilla Only ATM) and others.

Leave a post with what kind of game server you'd like and the number of slots, and I will PM you with more info.

Just want to give back to the community.

Thanks :D
